follow_us_on_twitter: Please follow the official Twitter account (@mercaridevjp) for all announcements and information!

about.p1: Mercari Tech Conf (MTC) is a technology conference introducing the future business direction and the technological challenges of the companies of the Mercari Group to fellow engineers.
about.p2: The theme of Mercari Tech Conf 2018 is Evolution. At this second annual conference we will introduce how the Mercari Group has evolved over the past year, and the changes yet to come.
about.p3: In addition to various talk sessions, there will also be exhibition booths run by our various engineering teams as well as an after party with food and drinks provided. We hope all attendees can take advantage of this opportunity to socialize and network with your fellow engineers.
about.p4: Simultaneous interpretation into English and Japanese will be provided for all sessions.

access.title: Roppongi Academyhills
access.address: Mori Tower 49th Floor 6-10-1 Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo 106-0032

train.title: Access by Subway
texts: Tokyo Metro Hibiya Line Roppongi Station / 3 min. walk from Exit 1C (Direct link to concourse)
Toei Subway Oedo Line Roppongi Station / 6 min. walk from Exit 3

fromShibuya.title: From Shibuya Station
texts: Toei Route RH01 bus (Shibuya Station ⇔ Roppongi Hills): Get off at “Roppongi Hills” or “Roppongi Hills Keyakizaka” (Approx. 15 min.)
Toei Route 01 bus (Shibuya Station ⇔ Shimbashi Station): Get off at “EX-THEATER-ROPPONGI-MAE” (Approx. 14 min.)

fromShimbashi.title: From Shimbashi Station
texts: Toei Route 01 bus (Shimbashi Station ⇔ Shibuya Station) : Exit at “EX-THEATER-ROPPONGI-MAE” (Approx. 16 min.)
